places.title: Effurun Roundabout
places.address: Effurun-Sapele Rd, Effurun, Warri, Delta State
places.description: The gateway into Warri's commercial district, symbolizing the city's vibrant and dynamic economy.

places.title: Olu of Warri Palace
places.description: Historical royal residence of the Itsekiri people, representing centuries of cultural heritage and leadership.

places.title: Delta Mall (Shoprite)

places.title: Warri Township Stadium
places.description: Multi-purpose stadium and home ground to Warri Wolves FC, hosting sports and entertainment events.

places.title: Warri Port
places.description: A vital commercial seaport linking Warri to maritime trade routes and inland cargo logistics.

places.title: Red Mangrove Forest
places.address: Warri River Bank, Warri South-West LGA
places.description: A unique ecological site featuring mangroves, vital to the Niger Delta's biodiversity.

places.title: Osubi Airport
places.address: Airport Road, Osubi, Warri, Delta State
places.description: A key air transport terminal serving Warri and the Niger Delta region, enabling easy business and executive travel connections.

places.title: Nana Living History Museum
places.address: Nana Olomu Palace Rd, Koko, Warri North LGA
places.description: Historic site preserving the legacy of Chief Nana Olomu, a 19th-century Itsekiri merchant prince.
